headline: Jim Cramer Might Have Shared A Major Warning About The Clorox Company (CLX)
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Analyzed These 10 Stocks & Discussed Inflation. The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is a household brand when it comes to consumer and household cleaning products. Its shares have lost 25% due to less-than-stellar earnings and tariffs. The Clorox […]
